column5: I was thinking of checking out rice lake some time this summer.  I dont have a boat or anything.  Are there places to fish off shore there or rent boats?  Also what types of lures would be most successful for targeting bass here? If anyone has any info please advise.  Thx.
I rent boat at gores landing, and use drop shot near the sunken railroad.  there are lots of smallies.
Tons of fish in that lake. Bewdley and Gores Landing would be your best bets for boat rentals. You can fish off the Bewdley dock if you don't mind a crowd.
Tons of spots on Rice to rent boats....Bewdley, Gores landing, Harwood (Golden Beach resort) all have boat rentals. Just to name a few.
what do you think is avg cost for boat rental for like 5-6 hrs??
honestly man just save your money and buy a used kayak or canoe for $300 off of kijiji, life savers for people who can't afford boats.

Generally your looking at about $100 a day + gas.  Most wont do an hourly rental (though they may have a half day rate).  I've rented from Harrison's boat works many times and they've been great but I'm sure there's other good ones as well.
this weekend isn't going to be a good idea for you to go as there is a tourny there on Sat. launching from harris boat works.
Harris Boat Works - wish it was Harrison  x2, great folks, use their launch whenever I fish Rice.
Whoops - thats what I get for typing before I've finished my morning coffee - thanks for the correction
